Html:
Hi,

For some reason I can't use the method "setCellValueByColumnAndRow()", I can only use "setCellValue". As far as I understand, the directory structure is intact. Do I need to include any file besides PHPExcel.php in order to use this functionality?

I have PHP 5.2.8 and I use PHPExcel 1.7.4.

Thanks in advance!
Never mind, I did sove the problem my self.
glad you were able to solve this yourself.

Hi,

So what is the solution to use setCellValueByColumnAndRow()?

I have the same problem on php v5.3.0 and PHPExcel v1.7.5

Fatal error: Call to undefined method PHPExcel::setCellValueByColumnAndRow()

Thanks for your help.

Your problem is possibly the fact that setCellValueByColumnAndRow() is not a method of the PHPExcel object, but of the PHPExcel_Worksheet object

A workbook (PHPExcel object) doesn't have cells, it has one or more worksheets (PHPExcel_Worksheet objects); and it's the worksheets that have cells
